text: Charles Paul Rettig (born November 18, 1956) is an American politician and lawyer. He was the United States Commissioner of Internal Revenue from 2018 to 2022. He was a partner at the Beverly Hills tax law firm of Hochman, Salkin, Rettig, Toscher & Perez, P.C., "known in the industry as a controversy firm" according to the Los Angeles Times. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:New York University alumni Category:Lawyers from Los Angeles Category:Commissioners of Internal Revenue
title: Charles P. Rettig
